title: The Russian's Ballerina
description: Hard meet soft...Alec Dolokhov, the cruel Russian mobster never expected to cross paths with the graceful ballerina that one day shows up on his doorstep.Twirling into his world with her tulle and disarming kindness, Alec doesnâ€™t even know what hit him. All he knows is that he has to keep her in his life. With the precision that only an underground boss can have, he hunts her down and makes her his.But Alec has one, dangerous secret that threatens to tear them apart. And when his ballerina finds out she might dance out of his life forever...
author: Ever Lilac
